thread.title: The Rock Posts Unique Leg Workout Video on Instagram
thread.title_full: The Rock Posts Unique Leg Workout Video on Instagram

author: Adam Wells
title: The Rock Posts Unique Leg Workout Video on Instagram

organizations.name: instagram alberto e. rodriguez/getty images adam wells fe

text: The Rock Posts Unique Leg Workout Video on Instagram Alberto E. Rodriguez/Getty Images Adam Wells Featured Columnist March 30, 2017 Among the many things The Rock is known for, intense workouts are at the top of the list, and he clues fans into his training regimen with videos on social media. In his latest post on Instagram, The Rock introduces his fans to a new and unique spin on the traditional vertical leg press ( warning: video contains NSFW language ): A photo posted by therock (@therock) WWE fans will be keeping a close eye on The Rock's schedule heading into this weekend. WrestleMania 33 is on Sunday from Orlando, Florida, near his hometown of Miami. He has appeared at wrestling's biggest event, either as a competitor or special attraction, each of the last five years. With The Rock having a prominent role in the upcoming The Fate of the Furious movie, WrestleMania would seem to be an excellent promotional opportunity for the former WWE champion. Like the new article format? !
